ðŸ“– Summary: Pterodactyl Panel is an open-source game server management panel that allows users to easily manage game servers through a web interface. It utilizes Docker containers to isolate game servers, enhancing security and resource management. The panel provides an intuitive UI for end users to control their game servers.
